channel.title: Donator Items
channel.description:
Can someone post a tutorial or tell me how to say that some items are donator only and can't be weared if you're not a donator? And can you also tell me where to put the code
Thnx alot :)

item.title: Donator Items
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Do it right and base it off of the Members mechanic in your Client.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Items
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“EvoIllusions, post:7, topic:463799”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=567471.msg4122985#msg4122985 date=1349992130]
Go to Item.java and create something like this:

public static final int[] DONATORITEMS =
{
              Item IDs here: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
};

Then go into Client.java and create something like this:

if (donator < 1) {
    for (int i : Item.DONATORITEMS) {
        if (wearID == i) {
            sendMessage("You must be a donator to wear this item.");
            return false;
        }
    }
}

[/quote]
Hey Dude, I respect you for actually being helpful to the players. But let’s try to get them to think a little on their own too and not just spoon-feed them what they need.

      -[shadow=red,left][url=http://lmgtfy.com/?q=Stay+posted!!!]εvøℑllusions[/shadow]™[/quote]

OMG BRO, A JUNIOR MEMBER JUST GAVE YOU RESPECT FOR HIM. No fucks given.

OT: I suggest you read up on array, and if-else statements, which I saw you had a problem with in your other post.

Read full topic

I really did try to find out how it works but i couldn’t find it.
Thank you for helping

item.title: Donator Items
item.dc:creator: @Devastational Devastational
item.description:
@Devastational wrote:

[code]In the ItemAssistant.java (src\server\model\items) Put this: Quote: public static final int[] donItems = {###, ###, ###}; before this: Quote: public int[][] brokenBarrows Now search: Quote: public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) { Put this under that put this:

Quote:
if(c.isDonator == 0)
for(int i : donItems)
if(wearID == i) {
c.sendMessage("@red@You must be a donator to wear this item.");
return false;
}[/code]
Where the ##'s are is where you put your item ids that you wish to make donators.

Save and compile.
You shouldn’t, but if you do have any errors or problems just post them and i’ll tell you how to fix.
It’s a nice simple system, enjoy.

Credits to X dds PK X ^.

Read full topic
